评论详情: I am giving this 4 stars because those that are athletic or into working out would really enjoy this athletic jacket. The  jacket is made out of a  polyester like fabric. It’s is thin and breathable. The faux fur lining is able to be removed (although the faux fur continuously gets in the zipper). This athletic jacket has rhinestones throughout the “New Orleans Fleur-de-lis” like design. The size is true to size. I would not classify this as a pull over or sweatshirt this is an athletic jacket.

to start, this jacket is absolutely gorgeous. i love the design. however, i did not expect it to be as light and thin as it is. this isn’t necessarily a bad thing, but keep that in mind if you’re looking for something more suited for winter, cause it is not the warmest. but it’s definitely got decent quality. the fur piece on the hood comes off which i think is neat. it’s also not super soft but comfortable enough. i think it’s worth it if you’re looking for something cute to style with!
Absolutely 0 warmth. This jackets only purpose is for looks. Shein quality, very thin, feels cheap. You can literally feel the wind blowing through the jacket. At least it’s pretty.

This hoodie is seriously so cute! I absolutely love it! It’s soft and warm. It’s stitched well, high quality. It’s worth every penny! It has rhinestones that sparkle, and a furry hood that you can zip off if you’d like. Sizing is on point too. Love it!
Picture was good. Item was a little thin clothewise for a hoodie. Faux fur part of hoodie was flat when arrived. Had to figure out to fluff. Little beads come off easy. But the girl loves it.
El material y el diseño muy buenos
This is soo cute, I love the designs and the fur hood is to die for. I got a small and it felt a bit to big on me. But other then that it’s so cute
Special hoody for a sweet teenage granddaughter! Sparkly, pink and furry! Very unique!
